wsal_post_meta_updated.name: wsal_post_meta_updated
wsal_post_meta_updated.summary: This hook runs before the logging of post meta update events, such as event ID 2062 and 2054 (refer to the complete list of WordPress activity log event IDs for more details).
wsal_post_meta_updated.description: This hook can be used to log events of updated post meta from the front-end, since the plugin only keeps a log of post meta updates done via the WordPress admin pages.

meta_id.label: meta_id
meta_id.description: Unique ID of the meta data.

object_id.label: object_id
object_id.description: Post ID to which the meta data belongs to.

old_meta.label: old_meta
old_meta.description: Array of the meta data containing key & values of old meta data before it is updated.

meta_key.label: meta_key
meta_key.description: Key of the meta data being updated.

meta_value.label: meta_value
meta_value.description: Value of the meta data being updated.
